TheParasitized:pi_callOfSwarm_power.NAME: 大群之唤
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时，升级所有手牌

TheParasitized:pi_sacrifice_power.NAME: 牺牲
DESCRIPTIONS: 你可以打出诅咒牌，打出诅咒牌时，抽

TheParasitized:pi_wither_power.NAME: 凋零
DESCRIPTIONS: 点生命，施加者恢复同等生命并使层数减半

TheParasitized:pi_graspingAtCurses_power.NAME: 野蛮生长
DESCRIPTIONS: 生命值, 增加诅咒奖励

TheParasitized:pi_thornyFlesh_power.NAME: 蛰刺皮肤
DESCRIPTIONS: 被攻击时，给予攻击者 层虚弱，层中毒

TheParasitized:pi_cognitiveFilter_power.NAME: 认知滤网
DESCRIPTIONS: 当你获得负面状态时，获得

TheParasitized:pi_infection_power.NAME: 寄染
DESCRIPTIONS: 给予负面状态时，额外给予

TheParasitized:pi_parasite_power.NAME: 寄染
DESCRIPTIONS: 给予负面状态时，额外给予

TheParasitized:pi_sharpenBlade_power.NAME: 打磨刀刃
DESCRIPTIONS: 给予负面状态时，额外给予

TheParasitized:pi_69_parasite_power.NAME: 寄生
DESCRIPTIONS: 受到攻击时，攻击者恢复

TheParasitized:pi_getMad_power.NAME: 狂乱
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时，对所有敌人造成
点伤害，将1张错误加入手牌

TheParasitized:pi_onslaught_power.NAME: 猛攻
DESCRIPTIONS: 当你给予负面状态时，抽

TheParasitized:pi_serene_power.NAME: 宁静
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时，给予所有单位

TheParasitized:pi_skillful_power.NAME: 超凡技艺
DESCRIPTIONS: 当你成功挡下伤害时，抽

TheParasitized:pi_suppress_power.NAME: 威压
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合内，有负面状态的敌人对你的伤害为0

TheParasitized:pi_initial.NAME: 寄染之人
DESCRIPTIONS: 当你手牌中的 寄染状态 牌数量大于2时，造成和受到的伤害增加20%。 NL 数量大于4时，每当你的回合开始时，少抽2张牌，造成和受到的伤害增加50%。
